Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class NoteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.NoteBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectableBuilder, DurationalBuilder
    public final class NoteBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements DurationalBuilder, ConnectableBuilder
    Class for building Note objects. The built note is cached.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

        public NoteBuilder​(Pitch pitch,
                   Duration duration)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:

        duration - the duration set in this builder

      • NoteBuilder

        public NoteBuilder​(NoteBuilder builder)
        Copy constructor for NoteBuilder. Creates a new instance of NoteBuilder that is a copy of the NoteBuilder given as an attribute. This does not copy connections to other builders through notations.
        Parameters:
        builder - the NoteBuilder to be copied

      • NoteBuilder

        public NoteBuilder​(Note note)
        Constructor that creates a builder with the pitch, duration, and articulations of the given note. Ties and connected notations are not copied.
        Parameters:
        note - the note from which pitch, duration, and articulations are copied to the created builder

      • addOrnament

        public void addOrnament​(Ornament ornament)
        Adds the given ornament to this builder. For adding grace notes the setPrecedingGraceNotes(List) and setSucceedingGraceNotes(List) methods should be used.
        Parameters:
        ornament - the ornament to add to this builder

      • setPrecedingGraceNotes

        public void setPrecedingGraceNotes​(java.util.List<? extends OrnamentalBuilder> graceNoteBuilders)
        Sets the given grace note builders to this builder. The grace notes will be built and added to this as preceding grace notes. The grace notes will be connected to the primary note with the note connections defined in the last grace note builder in the list. This builder takes ownership of the given builders.
        Parameters:
        graceNoteBuilders - the builders for the grace notes that this builder will add to the built note

      • setSucceedingGraceNotes

        public void setSucceedingGraceNotes​(java.util.List<? extends OrnamentalBuilder> graceNoteBuilders)
        Sets the given grace note builders to this builder. The grace notes will be built and added to this as succeeding grace notes. This builder takes ownership of the given builders.
        Parameters:
        graceNoteBuilders - the builders for the grace notes that this builder will add to the built note

      • getOrnaments

        public java.util.Collection<Ornament> getOrnaments()
        Returns the ornaments set in this builder.
        Returns:
        the ornaments set in this builder

      • addTieToFollowing

        public void addTieToFollowing​(NoteBuilder builder)
        Tie this builder to a following builder. The builder that this is tied to should be built before this. When the notes are built the Note returned by the call of build on this will be tied to the Note built by builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder for the following note that this is to be tied to.

      • isTiedFromPrevious

        public boolean isTiedFromPrevious()
        Returns true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder.
        Returns:
        true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder

      • getFollowingTied

        public java.util.Optional<NoteBuilder> getFollowingTied()
        Returns the NoteBuilder of the following tied note, if there is one.
        Returns:
        Optional containing the NoteBuilder of the following tied note if there is one, otherwise empty Optional.

      • connectWith

        public void connectWith​(Notation notation,
                        NoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableBuilder
        Connects this builder to the given note builder with the specified notation.

        The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

        Specified by:
        connectWith in interface ConnectableBuilder
        Parameters:
        notation - the notation with which this is connected to the target
        targetNoteBuilder - the note builder to which this is connected using the given notation

      • connectWith

        public void connectWith​(Notation notation,
                        GraceNoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectableBuilder
        Connects this builder to the given grace note builder with the specified notation.

        The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

        Specified by:
        connectWith in interface ConnectableBuilder
        Parameters:
        notation - the notation with which this is connected to the target
        targetNoteBuilder - the grace note builder to which this is connected using the given notation

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Removes the cached note that was built on the previous call of build.

      • build

        public Note build()
        Creates a note with the values set in this builder. This method has side effects. The method calls build recursively on the following NoteBuilder and GraceNoteBuilder objects to which this is tied. Calling this method to create the first note in a sequence of tied notes builds all the tied notes. The Note objects are cached in the builders. In case of tied notes, the temporally first one should be built first.
        Specified by:
        build in interface DurationalBuilder
        Returns:
        a note instance with the values set in this builder.
